trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un menu a comparsa che consente un controllo di esporre funzionalità specifiche del contesto del controllo.

trans-unit.source: ContextMenu is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Menu di scelta rapida è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, vale a dire che può contenere una raccolta di oggetti di qualsiasi tipo (ad esempio stringa, immagine o un pannello).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ContextMenu class are used to define the position and behavior of the ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà della classe ContextMenu vengono utilizzate per definire la posizione e il comportamento della classe ContextMenu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> can have a ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>può avere un ContextMenu.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a ContextMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Se si assegna un menu di scelta rapida per il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>classe gestisce operazioni di scelta rapida in risposta all'interazione dell'utente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Part of the work the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> does is opening the ContextMenu when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control.
trans-unit.target: Parte del lavoro di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>does aprire il menu di scelta rapida quando l'utente sceglie il pulsante destro del mouse sul controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the ContextMenu and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> classes.
trans-unit.target: Le seguenti proprietà vengono definite per il menu di scelta rapida e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both ContextMenu and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, the property value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se una di queste proprietà sono impostata su entrambi ContextMenu e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, il valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> A ContextMenu is automatically placed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A>A ContextMenu viene automaticamente posizionato all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ContextMenu Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ContextMenu controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizzare il controllo menu di scelta rapida per applicare le stesse impostazioni di proprietà a più controlli ContextMenu, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>per fornire al controllo un aspetto univoco.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla creazione di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, vedere [personalizzazione dell'aspetto di un controllo esistente tramite la creazione di ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ContextMenu, see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le parti e stati specifici per il menu di scelta rapida, vedere [ContextMenu stili e modelli](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà di dipendenza per questo controllo potrebbe essere impostata dallo stile predefinito del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se una proprietà viene impostata da uno stile predefinito, la proprietà può variare rispetto al valore predefinito quando il controllo viene visualizzato nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Lo stile predefinito è determinato dal tema del desktop viene utilizzato quando l'applicazione è in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [temi WPF predefiniti](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ContextMenu control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Impostando una proprietà visiva può avere effetto solo se la proprietà è sia presente nel modello predefinito del controllo del menu di scelta rapida che viene impostata tramite una.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: È possibile trovare un elenco di proprietà visive nella sezione "Modifica la struttura Visual di un controllo" [personalizzazione dell'aspetto di un controllo esistente tramite la creazione di ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando una particolare istanza di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> chiude.

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni evento indirizzato di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> dell'evento indirizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should be placed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un callback che indica dove un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> deve essere posizionato sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>proprietà deve essere impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>per il delegato di callback da utilizzare.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>delegato restituisce una matrice di possibili punti definiti rispetto al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene visualizzato il menu di scelta rapida, viene scelto un punto che consente di ottimizzare la quantità del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>finestra è visibile.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as it is for the popup.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento è lo stesso sia per la finestra popup.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: specificare una posizione di Popup personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A callback that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un callback che specifica il percorso del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controllo supporta lo scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo ha un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>nello stile e ha una comportamento di scorrimento da tastiera personalizzato <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>deve restituire `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context menu appears with a dropped shadow.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il menu di scelta rapida viene visualizzato con un'ombra rilasciata.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>si apre il valore è impostato sul valore <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Impostando questa proprietà su `true` non ha alcun effetto se la <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context menu appears with a dropped shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se viene visualizzato il menu di scelta rapida con un'ombra rilasciata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza orizzontale tra l'origine di destinazione e l'allineamento popup punto.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile posizionare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà si comportano allo stesso come avviene per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None | # # Attributo XAML ``` - or – ``` # # valori XAML *doppie* rappresentazione di stringa di un valore.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Ciò viene interpretato come un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] misura.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un valore di `1` è accettabile.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso <xref:System.Double>si applicano le restrizioni dell'intervallo come indicato nella sezione valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *doppie* come descritto in precedenza, seguito da una delle seguenti stringhe di dichiarazione di unità: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(impostazione predefinita) è [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` pollici; in 1 = = 96px `cm` centimetri; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` punti; 1pt==(96/72) px **nota** In molti casi un double può essere impostato su Auto, ma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>se gli offset sono impostati su Auto non verranno visualizzati</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> un

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: La distanza orizzontale tra l'origine di destinazione e il punto di allineamento popup.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sul punto di allineamento popup e di origine di destinazione, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> è visibile.

trans-unit.source: When IsOpen is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: Quando IsOpen viene impostata su `true`, acquisizione del mouse è impostata la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>e il relativo sottoalbero.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> è visibile; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea e restituisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"> </xref> oggetto per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*> property changed.
trans-unit.target: Segnala che la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>proprietà modificata.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> event is raised by an object inside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento viene generato da un oggetto all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Risponde al <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a context menu's visual parent changes.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene modificato l'elemento padre visuale di un menu di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: The object that the context menu was previously attached to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che il menu di scelta rapida in precedenza era associato a.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a context menu opens.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica all'apertura di una particolare istanza di un menu di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> dell'evento indirizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Placement property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la proprietà della posizione di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>viene assegnato al <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>Modifica il valore di questa proprietà quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>apre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the mouse, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'utente apre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>utilizzando il mouse, la selezione è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the keyboard, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'utente apre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>utilizzando la tastiera, la selezione è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera modificare la posizione di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile posizionare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, la selezione host, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà si comportano allo stesso come avviene per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area relative to which the context menu is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'area rispetto al quale è posizionato il menu di scelta rapida quando si apre.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile posizionare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà si comportano allo stesso come avviene per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The area that defines the rectangle that is used to position the context menu.
trans-unit.target: L'area che definisce il rettangolo che viene utilizzato per posizionare il menu di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> relative to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> relazione al quale il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> è posizionato all'apertura.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property to the owning <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>viene assegnato al <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>Modifica il valore di questa proprietà nell'oggetto proprietario <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>apre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: To use a different <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare una diversa <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The element relative to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento in relazione al quale il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> è posizionato all'apertura.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Prepara l'elemento specificato per visualizzare l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: La preparazione dell'elemento potrebbe richiedere l'applicazione di stili, impostazione delle associazioni e così via.

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elemento usato per visualizzare l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should close automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> deve chiudersi automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the menu should stay open until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> property changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il menu deve restare aperto fino a quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>le modifiche alle proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.StaysOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.StaysOpen*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.StaysOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza verticale tra l'origine di destinazione e l'allineamento popup punto.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile posizionare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà si comportano allo stesso come avviene per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None | # # Attributo XAML ``` - or – ``` # # valori XAML *doppie* rappresentazione di stringa di un valore.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Ciò viene interpretato come un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] misura.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un valore di `1` è accettabile.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso <xref:System.Double>si applicano le restrizioni dell'intervallo come indicato nella sezione valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *doppie* come descritto in precedenza, seguito da una delle seguenti stringhe di dichiarazione di unità: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(impostazione predefinita) è [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` pollici; in 1 = = 96px `cm` centimetri; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` punti; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In molti casi un double può essere impostato su Auto, ma un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>non viene visualizzata se l'offset sono impostati su Auto</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: La distanza verticale tra l'origine di destinazione e il punto di allineamento popup.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sul punto di allineamento popup e di origine di destinazione, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
